fields.Dialogue Text: "Simply that *under suitably revolutionary conditions* crop yields naturally increase relative to non-revolutionary crops. Which Maurice somehow has the gall to deny."

fields.Dialogue Text: Well, there you did it. You stung them, and to what end?

fields.Dialogue Text: Something about this one makes you want to avoid dark alleys at night...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You've spent a not inconsiderable a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've spent a not inconsiderable amount of time arranging the works in your mental library by theme and period. All the ideas and references you'll need are ready-at-hand.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm more into practical books. Boo..."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, I just thought there would be more..."

fields.Title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It seems like there's something on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It seems like there's something on your mind. Maybe a question you mean to ask?"  The young man turns to his companion, then back to you.

fields.Title: You: ""What are you then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you then?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Somehow you only now realise that t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somehow you only now realise that the temperature has been dropping steadily for the last half hour.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Their faces, blurred yet frozen as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Their faces, blurred yet frozen as though in ambrotype. You were never *that young*, were you?

fields.Title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Either way, that's enough parlour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, that's enough parlour games for one night. Thanks for humouring us."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Matchboxes, it appears."
fields.Dialogue Text: Matchboxes, it appears.

fields.Title: Steban, the Student Communist: "He sighs. "Yeah, it's hers. She jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "Yeah, it's hers. She just sort of... moved it all in a few months ago."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you like her art?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you like her art?"

fields.Title: Echo Maker: ""Besides, it would look pretty bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides, it would look pretty bad if people thought we were collaborating with the gendarmerie."
